Today I purchased a Twix, opened it and thought my hand had grown.  Then I realised the Twix had shrunk.  A Google investigation uncovered that it had in fact reduced in size by 14%.  Further investigation uncovered that this trend is happening throughout the industry.  Yorkies have reduced in size by 20% over the years, despite the price of cocoa dropping 40% in that time.

We must act now!  If we don’t we risk 'fun sized' chocolate bars outweighing their 'normal' sized counterparts.

No one wants that.

Stop the Stealth price hikes !!
